titleStmt.title: Nevvs for youngmen and maids. Who now may weep, their joy is fled, for love is dead and buried. To a curious new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for W. Thacery [sic], and W. Whitwood.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Verse: "From fairy land I hear it is reported,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
